Articles.Content:
One day, Jeb convinced Bill, Bob and Val to play Kussian Roulette with him...

They marched into a room with a table there, and a gun sitting on it.

Jeb ran to the table, picked up the gun, pointed it to his head and pulled the trigger...

[BANG!]

{THUD}

Val turns to Bill and Bob and says...

"I don;t think he knew you play the game with a revolver, not an automatic!"
Jeb has killed himself. Why should we be sad
